channel.title: Ask-Engine [New idea]!
channel.description:
Okay i am looking for workers for this massive massive project! here is the concept:
The main idea is a AI Bot that Theoretically can answer anything you input in it, everything from a famous actors birthday to a simple math equation.
How it will work is a team of people input the question asked and the answer to it, then when someone asks the bot the question he fetch the answer i realize this is a on going project that can go on for months and months but what do you guys think?

item.title: Ask-Engine [New idea]!
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

One problem, this already exists: http://www.chacha.com/

If you remember the KGB commercials, that’s them. They’ve been growing their database for like the past 6 years.

The idea itself isn’t all that bad, just that someone has already thought of it and it’ll be a pretty big challenge to compete with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask-Engine [New idea]!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you’d be better off mimicking ask fm, because nobody wants to build up the database of questions for people to use later as the framework of the bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask-Engine [New idea]!

item.description:
@vortex wrote:

you are quite the “helper”

item.title: Ask-Engine [New idea]!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

It would be cool, yes. The world is lazy enough, stop letting them be more lazy. Also Google can do similar stuff, such as the math equation, or use the “I’m Feeling Lucky” button.

Read full topic
